content.webTitle: Win a week in a skiing chalet in Courchevel

fields.headline: Win a week in a skiing chalet in Courchevel
fields.bodyText: Take to the slopes in the top ski resort, Courchevel. Guardian Unlimited Travel and Altitude Holidays are giving away a holiday to one lucky winner, plus a maximum of five friends, staying in a catered ski chalet situated in the heart of Courchevel 1650. Courchevel offers outstanding skiing with plenty of things to see and do. Skiers can access the whole of the Trois Vallées - with over 600km of pistés, plus the four villages that make up Courchevel. Based in Moriond, the local name for Courchevel 1650, the village is smaller and more typically French than Courchevel 1850, but still has plenty of shops, restaurants and nightlife to keep you entertained off the slopes. From a daily English newspaper delivered to your chalet and board games, to cooked breakfasts and three-course meals in the evening with free wine, Altitude have everything in your chalet taken care of. For more information about Altitude Holidays and details of a fantastic 10% discount exclusively for Guardian Unlimited users visit www.altitudeholidays.com/guardian or phone 0870 870 7669. A huge variety of ski passes are available, and whether you're a beginner or a seasoned skier, you'll find something for you in the varied slopes of Courchevel. To enter click here Swissair operates four daily flights from London Heathrow to Geneva and seven to Zurich. The schedule features both early morning departures from the UK and evening return flights from Switzerland. For further information and reservations visit: www.swissair.co.uk, call 0845 601 0956 or contact your travel agent. ATS Savoie is a company who specialise in transfers to and from the resorts of The Three Valleys and Chambery, Geneva & Lyon airports in comfortable, private vehicles. Do you know a friend who would love to have a chance of winning this competition? Simply click on "Send to a Friend" below.
